comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=2023+economy&oq=2023+eco&aqs=edge.2.0i512l2j0i131i433i512j0i512l2j69i57j0i512l3.6283j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D2023%2Beconomy%26oq%3D2023%2Beco%26aqs%3Dedge.2.0i512l2j0i131i433i512j0i512l2j69i57j0i512l3.6283j0j1%26sourceid%3Dchrome%26ie%3DUTF-8) ### Comment Username: @PA1138 > Whenever I do a Google Search in Edge (Chromium based) or Chrome or Opera, the search ends in an error, after like 5 minutes. However, the first couple of searches of the day work, afterwards it just stops. > > When it comes to Firefox however, Google Search works, but when clicking on images, it stops working. > > When using DuckDuckGo or Bing on any of the browsers to search, they work just fine. The issue is only when using Google as a search engine in those browsers. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/zOkSoGe.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/fzMk8SG.jpg)

Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180) DNS filtering: | server: `quic://dns.adguard-dns.com`
filters: `User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

This issue is recent (few months old) that I have raised with Adguard and have advised to follow these steps to report. issue.title: aemx.hrkbs.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://aemx.hrkbs.com/login.php

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. A long-standing phishing site spredding via email, having reported by many phishing hunters:
```
https://twitter.com/catnap707/status/1608589270859800578
https://twitter.com/harugasumi/status/1611914268563374080
https://twitter.com/hunter_phishing/status/1608530933875085312
```

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![scam1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58900598/211230449-eb76400f-ac4e-4e08-b497-b82685e29b3b.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![scam2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58900598/211230451-b9ead550-ff5d-4e0a-b3a8-c859b29502b1.png)

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
